{"id":932392458,"question_id":2665,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681289790,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"117 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/932392458/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Repair Cars","memory":"50.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long repairCars(int[] A, int cars) {\n        long left = 1, right = 1L * A[0] * cars * cars;\n        while (left < right) {\n            long mid = (left + right) / 2, cur = 0;\n            for (int a : A)\n                cur += (long)(Math.sqrt(1.0 * mid / a));\n            if (cur < cars)\n                left = mid + 1;\n            else\n                right = mid;\n        }\n        return left;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-repair-cars","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
